originalText.text: I just switched to my prescriptions to Capsule and I’ve had such a fabulous experience! Lovely and responsive customer service and such friendly and reliable delivery couriers. I’ve been having lots of issues at my local pharmacy and switching to Capsule has made such a difference! A usually complicated and long process is now so positive and easy!

text.text: I just switched to my prescriptions to Capsule and I’ve had such a fabulous experience! Lovely and responsive customer service and such friendly and reliable delivery couriers. I’ve been having lots of issues at my local pharmacy and switching to Capsule has made such a difference! A usually complicated and long process is now so positive and easy!

originalText.text: I tried this service on a whim more than a year ago and it has been the best pharmacy service experience since I made this switch.  My free deliveries has always been on point and I get text messages when they are in the area or on their way.  I love the cute and unique bags and packaging as well. I can can get customer service via chat (My preferred way) on my laptop, phone text or voice and at any time.  I just leave a text/voicemail and the reply is there when they open up.  I only wish I can get this kind of service when I or this pharmacy requests a call back from my doctors regarding refills.  BronxCare/Bronx Lebanon has yet to improve this ongoing issue.  Thanks Capsule for making one less thing stressful for the community.  I hope there was a location to someone I recommended this Pharmacy to so she too can be less stressed out each time she needs a refill.  Hopefully there is a Capsule Pharmacy in her area.  Thank You to the Delivery Team, PharmTechs and the Pharmacists for their assistance and pleasant customer service that I really appreciate. Keep Up The Great Work.!~SB from #TheBronx

originalText.text: I absolutely LOVE Capsule. The idea behind the service is genius. The app is easy to use and gives me visibility into my prescriptions that traditional pharmacies don’t give. Plus, the customer service is top notch. I am my dad’s main caregiver, so having Capsule take my mind off managing meds to focus on other parts of his health is a blessing. Highly recommend this service.

text.text: I absolutely LOVE Capsule. The idea behind the service is genius. The app is easy to use and gives me visibility into my prescriptions that traditional pharmacies don’t give. Plus, the customer service is top notch. I am my dad’s main caregiver, so having Capsule take my mind off managing meds to focus on other parts of his health is a blessing. Highly recommend this service.

originalText.text: The amazing feature that I love about Capsule is the convenience of having a Pharmacist return a text or even directly call me to discuss any concerns I have about medications (for myself or even family). I am my dad's main caregiver and Capsule's pharmacists were able to walk me through his meds and provide instant reassurance of any changes we can do which has immediately had a positive impact on his day-to-day life. Their services were such a HUGE help during lockdown (2020) and it's been a great experience every time. Their app is great as well, keeping the medications list organized and easy to schedule delivery times that works for us. I also love how the system keeps us informed where the delivery person is and how soon they'll arrive with our order. Thank you!

originalText.text: I love capsule. Apart from being organized, friendly, willing to help and fast. It’s super convenient. They are very helpful when it comes to discount cards and deliver my medications FOR FREE. Staff is super welcoming and nice and medication transfers are very easy to do. 10/10. I also appreciate the neatness of my medications. I never find any discrepancies when it comes to refilling my medication. The label is always straight on the bottle. The bag they give my medication in is always new. The first time I used capsule. THEY WROTE ME A HAND WRITTEN NOTE. 10/10 for being extra caring. I don’t have no complaints.
